snippet.title: The Talos Principle - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available Now: http://store.steampowered.com/app/257510

The Talos Principle is a first-person puzzle game in the tradition of philosophical science fiction. Made by Croteam, the creators of Serious Sam, and written by Tom Jubert (FTL, The Swapper) and Jonas Kyratzes (The Sea Will Claim Everything).

Follow The Talos Principle:
http://www.facebook.com/TheTalosPrinc...
http://twitter.com/TalosPrinciple

Follow Croteam:
http://www.facebook.com/croteam
http://twitter.com/Croteam
